listitem.para: What to do with received &IKEv1; packets.

Valid options are:
drop
silently drop any received IKEv1 packet
accept
accept &IKEv1; connections
reject
reply with an error.
If this option is set to drop or reject, an attempt to load an IKEv1 connection will fail, as these connections would never be able to receive a packet for processing.
